name: Bar Chart
description: A bar chart is a chart that represents data using vertical bars. Each bar represents a category of data, and the height of the bar represents the value of the data.

slots.name: xAxis
slots.description: The x-axis of the chart. This is the category of data that will be displayed on the x-axis.

slots.name: yAxis
slots.description: The y-axis of the chart. This is the value of the data that will be displayed on the y-axis.

slots.name: color
slots.description: The color of the bars. This is the color of the data that will be displayed on the bars.

slots.name: label
slots.description: The label of the bars. This is the label of the data that will be displayed on the bars.

name: Pie Chart
description: A pie chart is a chart that represents data using a circle. Each slice of the circle represents a category of data, and the size of the slice represents the value of the data.

slots.name: value
slots.description: The value of the data that will be displayed on the pie chart.

slots.name: label
slots.description: The label of the data that will be displayed on the pie chart.

slots.name: color
slots.description: The color of the pie chart. This is the color of the data that will be displayed on the pie chart.
